description:
go.tools/cmd/cover: get cover counters on if conditions
This requires a little more tree rewriting to put a block around the if of an "else if".
More tests too.

messages.text:

go.tools/cmd/cover: get cover counters on if conditions
This requires a little more tree rewriting to put a block around the if of an "else if".
More tests too.
